item.Headline: Forecasts
item.copy: We helped the U.S. Marine Corps forecast military training, equipment, and deployment forecasts for Asia and, at times, have represented the U.S. Marines' position on the National Intelligence Council.

item.Headline: CFIUS
item.copy: The Committee on Foreign Investment in the U.S. reviews acquisitions of critical technology for national security risks. Our consultants developed the risk framework, analysis, products, and advisory procedures for the Department of Homeland Security as private contractors.

item.Headline: Due Diligence
item.copy: In this project for ATF Partners we created a prospecting database and helped isolate high value acquisition targets. Once engaged with the target, we assisted with due diligence.

item.Headline: Risk
item.copy: The Department of Defense is a primary customer. We assisted in developing a risk assessment model that is used today by the Secretary, Under Secretary, and Assistant Secretary levels of several . executive agencies.
